events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection on 2024-05-09 evening.
The claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' following review of initial report and keywords extraction.
A claims agent has been assigned to oversee the investigation and processing of this vehicle accident claim.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and next steps.
Request sent for vehicle photos, police report, and witness statements to support the accident claim.
Customer provided all requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and official police report.
The investigation team began reviewing evidence and interviewing involved parties related to the accident.
Investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault and the claim is valid as per accident details.
A settlement amount was proposed covering repair costs and rental car expenses during vehicle restoration.
Customer expressed gratitude for swift processing and clear communication throughout the claim process.
Final approval granted by claims department after customer's agreement on settlement proposal.
Payment was successfully transferred to customer covering all approved damages and associated costs.
Claim officially closed after completion of payment and confirmation from customer regarding case resolution.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for future reference following case closure.
